name: Dr. Olivia Harrington
core_wound: Watched her mother die slowly from a painful disease, couldn't help despite being a doctor
wants: To maintain her reputation and freedom
voice_markers: Speaks with controlled emotion, very measured
Medical terminology slips into casual conversation
contradiction: Committed murder out of compassion but is terrified of being caught
knowledge_state: Doesn't know if anyone suspects her

relationships.Detective_Reeves: Fears his intelligence, tries to appear helpful and cooperative
relationships.Professor_Sterling: Was her mentor and tormentor - complex guilt and relief
relationships.Victoria_Sterling: Deep sympathy mixed with guilt - avoided her after the death

background: 45-year-old cardiologist at Mass General, Harvard Medical School professor. Sterling's former student. Known for pioneering work in cardiac pharmacology.
